content: निवापः {@--1@} Seed, grain, seed-corn. {@--2@} An offering to the Manes of deceased parents or other relatives, a libation of water &c. at the Śrāddha ceremony; एको निवापसलिलं पिबसीत्ययुक्तं <ls>Māl. 9. 40</ls>; निवापदत्तिभिः <ls>R. 8. 86</ls>; निवापांजलयः पितॄणां <ls n="R.">5. 8</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 91</ls>, <ls>Mu. 4. 5.</ls> {@--3@} A gift or offering in general.
